name: get-the-lead-out-map
description: Online Interactive Map of Levels of Lead in Water in California Schools

scripts.clean: cd data && rm -fr compressed.csv cooccurrences downloads indices
scripts.setup: npm install && cd data && bash setup.sh
scripts.zip: zip -r get-the-lead-out-map.zip app.js csv2geojson.js index.html style.css tabs.css utils.js data/compressed.csv data/cooccurrences data/downloads data/indices

author: GeoSurge
